subSubSection.paragraph:
Inca clathratus sommeri
[gender agreement corrected here]
Types. One female syntype in BMNH.

Remarks. Many authors listed the publication date as Westwood, 1845 which is incorrect. According to BOUSQUET (2016) the pages 97 to 112 in
Arcana Entomologica Vol. II.
were published on 1 May 1844 .
